title: 你知唔知我真係好鍾意你

replies.msg:
其實你心入面有冇我?平時點解要咁樣對我?
但成日約你你又會出黎，出到黎又會唔同感覺咁。如果我冇機會就唔好比錯覺我，我唔想要假希望。
其實好多野我真係第一次為你而做，突登上網睇教學，因為我真係沉船了，我比表面更喜歡你。你話你會留意下星座既野，唔太信既我會去留意下有乜特質係同你有啲相似，希望可以再了解你多啲。
我都想擁有一次機會好好咁愛你。
你可唔可以認真注視下我呢？
不要暗戀

replies.msg: 女人係咁善變，唔可以話矛盾，只不過因為某啲野諗起以前既事，好驚如果盡力愛多一次又會悲劇收場。明明係對你有feel但都慢慢收起變到想順其自然一啲。好多野都唔公平因為對方以前既經歷令到佢知道其實佢知你好好甚至比佢以前既他/她更好，但佢真係無辦法拎返以前愛人既份量係你身上，真係好難既事，怨都冇用，可能就係咁令彼此錯過左

女人係咁善變，唔可以話矛盾，只不過因為某啲野諗起以前既事，好驚如果盡力愛多一次又會悲劇收場。明明係對你有feel但都慢慢收起變到想順其自然一啲。好多野都唔公平因為對方以前既經歷令到佢知道其實佢知你好好甚至比佢以前既他/她更好，但佢真係無辦法拎返以前愛人既份量係你身上，真係好難既事，怨都冇用，可能就係咁令彼此錯過左

Let go the past my friend! It's water under the bridge. What's done is done. It's no use crying over spilt milk. My friend Jason is a Pisces whereas his girlfriend is a Capricorn. He's faithful to her and would never cheat on her. When he broke up with his ex, he was pushed over the edge. Even when a stranger talked to him, there was an edge of hostility to his voice. But as soon as he had a new relationship target, it took the edge of his emotional upset. His ex is a swimming champion who easily outshines me and him in any swimming styles. She's tall and shapely who definitely has the edge over a lot of swimmers. Last week, he and his current girlfriend dined in a hotel's restaurant which is midway between his house and the post office. They stood in line outside the restaurant for an hour. The line was so huge that it stretched from the counter through the lobby area and out the main entrance of the hotel. A stout man tried to cut in line but was caught. Recently, he got into a scuffle with a guy who was hitting on his girlfriend. The police showed up later and assigned jealousy as the motive for the scuffle. Yesterday I popped over to their house and visited them. The bus queue for their residential estate was so big stretching down the road to the furthest mini bus stop. I queued for half an hour until three shuttle buses came along at once. Meanwhile, some people mistook this long queue for the queue for other places. A couple came up and asked "are you in the queue for Cluny Park?" to make sure that it's the right queue. A stout man pushed in at the head of the queue but people ignored it. Later a slender guy jumped the queue. The lady behind him said "Excuse me. The end of the queue is back there." A woman stood beside a guy who was midway through the queue. While pretending to look at her phone, she edged furtively behind him who didn't realise she was there. Some people might have noticed it but ignored it. When I saw Jason, he seemed on edge. It turns out he has a job interview tomorrow. Never has he felt so on edge before an interview. His brother sometimes has a snooze at lunchtime as he has so much work that he feels drained. He usually snoozes on the sofa or at his desk by the fireplace when everybody else's eating lunch outside. He once brought his work along with him to a library where he dozed off at the table. Taking a nap especially in front of the fire is a marvelous way to recharge your energy though. His sis has just completed her phd at Tokyo University and is on the way to becoming a professor. Japan is on the way to becoming the world's strongest economy.
